intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blockers change to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be obtained before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance/.
macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture must be available in the automation environment before running the benchmark.
Publish performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 in PERFORMANCE.md after manual profiling with Xcode Instruments on macOS developer machine.
Render times measured by Time Profiler must be less than 100 ms, allocations must be under 5 MB, and Core Animation must verify 60 FPS on device.
Publish performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 after manual benchmarks across iOS 17, macOS 14, and iPadOS 17.

Build time must be less than 10s for a clean build, binary size under 500 KB, memory footprint under 5 MB per screen, 60 FPS during interactions, and BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes must perform acceptably.
Compile cross‑platform test results and create a cross‑platform report after manual testing on iOS 17+ devices, macOS 14+ devices..

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed media assets and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export scenarios

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Run lenient vs strict benchmark on macOS with 1 GiB payload, collect runtime and RSS metrics, archive results

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish performance baseline data in PERFORMANCE.md after profiling

functional_units.name: Publish Benchmarks CI Integration
functional_units.description: Integrate performance benchmarks into CI with gates

functional_units.name: Compile Cross-Platform Test Report
functional_units.description: Compile test results from iOS, macOS, iPadOS devices and create a cross‑platform report

functional_units.name: Final Accessibility Sign-Off
functional_units.description: Complete manual accessibility testing and sign off on accessibility compliance
